headline: LSI (LYTS) Q3 Earnings Meet Estimates
summary: LSI (LYTS) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 0% and 0.40%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
